summary.title: Bedrohungsmodell - OTT Auth
summary.description: Die Firma Allsecure betreibt unterschiedliche Anwendungen mit Hilfe einer 2-Faktorauthentifizierung via One-time token, der an das entsprechende Smartphone des Nutzers geschickt wird.

threats.title: Client side Malware: Logger/ Phishing site generator/Phishing Emails
threats.description:
By having Malware installed or with a phishing Email, which presents the user with fake websites and an SMS listenter(in the Malware case), the attacker can circumvent 2FA and get the login details and the user session.
See: Mitre ID 98: Phishing
Att&ck T1566: Phishing
Att&ack
threats.mitigation: This only works for the web app and not the mobile client and phishing Websites are easily detectable

threats.title: Cross Zone Scripting
threats.description:
CAPEC-104
Att&ck: T1055 
after the exploit a rootkit could be left behind
(Att&ck: T1014)

data.description: Vergleicht eingegebenen OTT-Wert auf Telefon mit erwartetem OTT seitens 2-Faktor-Dienst.

threats.title: Falsesification  of 2FA tokens, Server Logs and password hashes
threats.description:
CAPEC 94: AiTM
Att&ck 1557: AiTM
Via an admin account, change the mentioned information

threats.title: HTTPS package flooding
threats.description:
Client side HTTPS flooding
CAPEC-469
Att&ck T-1499
threats.mitigation: SIEM system in place but no IP logging

threats.title: Illegal Access to others users account information
threats.description:
due to a lack of input vetting, via Command Injection (CAPEC-248) from the mobile app The database could be read out.
This will also result in the encryption of all database files for impact (Att&ck T1486)
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description:
No IP-Adress Tracking. This makes forensic analysis and legal action against attack next to impossible
CAPEC-268: Audit Log Manipulation
Att&ck T1654:  Log Enumeration

threats.title: Supply Chain Attack from main server
threats.description:
By Compromising one of the main servers and gaining admin access. The installation of a Rootkit would be possible on the OTT server
CAPEC-439
Att&ck: T1195 
Att&ck: T1014
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: No Auth in the Management report server
threats.description:
There are no internal priviledge checks.
By Accessing this. you can gain a lot of info.
CAPEC-157
T1040
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Supply Chain compromise via compromised Admin accounts
threats.description: By using valid compromised Admin accounts (Att&ck T1078) The system can be made to never trigger on any traffic (Att&ck T1565) via Config Manipulation (CAPEC-176)
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Lack of input vetting via Main server
threats.description: The insertion of improper control flows due to the lack of input vetting enables the destruction, deletion (Att&ck: T1565 ) of data via Command injection (CAPEC-248)
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A
